Text: Hey good friend jmanwf.Awesome job like always.Thanks to u i can see my favorite soap and sometimes i don't have the time to watch the episodes in the week but i love that i have them all for the weekend.DOOL Extravaganga,DOOL Mania mate..So now is time for u to rest and i hope u have a great weekend dude.C u next week.;-)
Don't forget guys days of our lives will be off air for 2 weeks during the Olympic games

A Big thank you once again to ''jmanwf'' for all the time and effort it takes to supply Days Of Our Lives for us all - you are very much appreciated - and do you know what 2 weeks that the olympic games are on that you were referring to - so I can save a few DOOL episodes in case of withdrawal symptoms
From Monday The 30 The of July i think
